column2: sleeplord, 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 10 years or more (Patient)
Robin Hersey, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
column9: My mother-in-law gave me my first bottle 8 years ago (I had never heard of the stuff, her family had used it for years.) For the last 8 years I've used it for all kinds of scrapes, cuts, etc. Orthodontists should recommend this for their patients. It is the most wonderful product. From minor mouth sores to the most painful wire punctures, it is takes the pain away almost entirely.

column2: 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 10 years or more
column9: I have used this product ST37 for sunburns road rashes, infected lacerations on animals, dermatitis, sore throats, and earaches, jaw aches, pulled teeth, infected toes, and blisters on animals feet.  I gargle with it before I have my teeth cleaned and used it after an episiotomy. I have kept more people at work by having ST37 available that other supervisors also purchased some to keep at their desks.  I am always amazed at how well it works.  I keep it in the bathrooms and at our summer homes.  My family laughingly say ST37 when someone has an owe.  I kiddingly say it will heal the sidewalk cracks.My Aunt put me on to it and says its been around forever. It is so worth it to have it in the kitchen. Kathy from Hend. NV

column2: Dutch, 75 or over Male  on Treatment for 10 years or more (Patient)
column9: Our family has used this product for over 60 years. Since we lived close to this products  earlier location outside Philadelphia,it was well known. Later it became difficult to locate ( Florida & Montana .)Thanks to internet--easier now to locate. Old timers know how great it is for cuts, scrapes and oral applications.

column2: 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 10 years or more (Patient)
column9: Used as a baby and now on grandchildren for all scraps and scratches and fever blisters.Doesn't burn and starts healing from the moment it is applied.  Love ST37.

column2: Elaine Tokarski, 65-74 Female  on Treatment for 10 years or more (Patient)
column9: I have used this product since childhood; I am 67 years old.  I have used it on minor cuts, minor burns and as a gargle for a sore throat.  It not only works but it is gentle and painless.

column2: 75 or over Male  on Treatment for 10 years or more (Patient)
column9: Our family antiseptic for over 80 years. My father had a bad foot infection about 1930, before the days of antibiotics, and they were going to cut it off.  An intern suggested trying this new ST 37 product and the foot was saved.  ST 37 was off the market for years, and just returned a few years ago.  It is great for all cuts and even sore throats, when diluted and gargled. Painless, with a slightly sweet taste, it works wonders as a wet compress.

column2: BusyMom, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 10 years or more (Patient)
column9: My great grandmother, grandmother, mom,and I have been using S.T.37 for years. This liquid antiseptic is absolutely incredible for so many things: burns, cuts, scrapes, mouth sores, fever blisters, sore throats, and mouth sores. I recently discovered how quickly it heals rashes. It takes the sting out of sunburns too. S.T. 37 does not sting at all so I have no problem putting it on my 3 year olds boo boos. The amazing thing is how quicly everything heals up when you use this product. Unfortuneately, S.T. 37 is hard to find. You can order it from any pharmacy or order it on Amazon. It is made by Numark Labs in New York, right here in good ole USA too!

column2: Vickiboat, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 10 years or more (Patient)
column9: My grandparents used st37 My mother was raised on it and so was I.  Now my kids use it.  It's great for everything, mouth pain,cuts,bug bites,sun burn, taking infection out of a cut-over night!! It's easy to use- put on a swab or cotton ball, no burning or stinging!! I could not live without this magical stuff!!!!!  I have 3 bottles in my medicine cabinet as we type!  THANK YOU!!
Excellent antiseptic for topical/mouth/gargle use.Difficult to find in stores rcently.

column2: robin316, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: This stuff works great.  I'd never heard of it before my mother-in-law told me of it. It instantly relieves  mouth pain from braces, ortho devices, etc.  Plus it helps wounds heal faster. It doesn't hurt to apply so your kids won't be squirming around.  It's safe enough to drink (per bottle) yet it works like alcohol.You can dilute it by 3 and its still as effective as full-strength (so a little goes a long way.)
